TopicTitle: Command Pod parts broken in KSP build mode

Articles.Content:
Hi. Title is issue. Whenever I click on a command pod part in the build menu it acts all buggy. Sometimes it spawns in but I can't interact with it at all, or other times it just wont spawn in at all. Or if it's not the first part, it wont be able to be attached. Here's my modlist:

https://imgur.com/a/9qeCKzL

Game version is latest version
